meanings.definition: Able to be talked about or discussed.
meanings.sent1: The movie was so talkable that everyone had something to say about it.
meanings.sent2: The new book is very talkable among readers.
meanings.sent3: The talkable topic at the party was the upcoming vacation plans.
meanings.sent4: The issue became so talkable that it dominated the news headlines.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious disappearance of the cat was the most talkable event in the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: Capable of being spoken to or conversed with.
meanings.sent1: The friendly parrot was very talkable and loved interacting with people.
meanings.sent2: The talkable robot responded to every question with a smile.
meanings.sent3: The talkable computer program seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: The talkable dog barked happily whenever someone approached.
meanings.sent5: The talkable AI assistant made the task easier with its helpful responses.
